snippet: The guilty plea by the so-called Underwear Bomber and charges in an assassination plot linked to Iran have people arguing again about whether terrorism cases are better handled in the criminal justice system or by the military.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces

lead_paragraph: The guilty plea by the so-called Underwear Bomber and charges in an assassination plot linked to Iran have people arguing again about whether terrorism cases are better handled in the criminal justice system or by the military.

headline.main: Developments Rekindle Debate Over Best Approach for Terrorism Suspects
headline.print_headline: Developments Rekindle Debate Over Best Approach for Terrorism Suspects
headline.seo: Debate Is Renewed Over Approach for Terrorism Suspects
